The Church of England's doctrine of non-resistance, justified and vindicated as truly rational and Christian; and the damnable nature of rebellious resistance represented. By Lewes Sharp, rector of Morton Hampstead, in Devon. Sharpe, Lewes.
[4], 63, [1] p.
printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall, London : M DC XCI. [1691]
Copy cropped affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
